_header: Some manner matter would I fain move
Note: Fourth stanza has an additional four lines (dede); 160 lines in all.
_description: Truth and Conscience — thirteen 12-line stanzas (ababbcbccdcd) including refrain, ‘Can tell where Conscyens ys become’

Wellcome673.First Lines:
Summe maner matere wolde I fayne meveAnd I wyst thes gentyllys all
                    to paye…
Wellcome673.Last Lines:
…Ther ys none to holy in his OfficeCan tell where Conscyens ys
                    be come
Wellcome673.Editions:
Kane,  George. 
             “The Middle English Verse in MS Wellcome 1493.” 
             London Medieval Studies
         2, Part. I (1951): 50-67: 61-5.
